attributes.action: Theresa May must resign as Prime Minister now to save Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Unfortunately, because she won a vote of no confidence that the government tabled against her on 15th January 2019 and now our politicians are unable to remove her for another 9 months, it is time we done something about that.  So, if you would like her to resign as Prime Minister and a real Brexiteer take over, somebody who can then rescue our Brexit please sign this petition, Thank You.
attributes.background: I have no confidence in our current Prime Minister. She has made our once great nation a laughing stock around the world. And after all the speeches about leaving the EU and a manifesto she called an election based on, Theresa May has failed to keep any of those promises and betrayed us all.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. That includes asking for people to resign or be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could search for and sign a petition about that:

https://petition.parliament.uk/

If you would like a general election, you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
